name: Store-Manager
description: Store Manager is a web application that helps store owners manage sales and product inventory records. This application is meant for use in a single store

scripts.pretest: npm install && babel --ignore node_modules,_build,package* . --out-dir _build && cp -R node_modules _build && cp package* _build
scripts.prestart: npm install && babel --ignore node_modules,_build,package* . --out-dir _build && cp -R node_modules _build && cp package* _build
scripts.predev-start: npm install && babel --ignore node_modules,_build,package* . --out-dir _build && cp -R node_modules _build && cp package* _build
scripts.precoveralls: npm install && babel --ignore node_modules,_build,package* . --out-dir _build && cp -R node_modules _build && cp package* _build
scripts.coveralls: cd _build && npm run cover -- --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls

author: Abejide Femi
